com.alee.extended.list
Class WebFileListCellRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  com.alee.laf.label.WebLabel
                      com.alee.laf.list.WebListElement
                          com.alee.laf.list.WebListCellRenderer
                              com.alee.extended.list.WebFileListCellRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
LanguageMethods, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ListCellRenderer, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class WebFileListCellRenderer
extends WebListCellRenderer

Custom list cell renderer for WebFileList component. This renderer is also able to generate image thumbnails for image file elements.

Since:
1.4
Author:
Mikle Garin
See Also:
Serialized Form

public void updateFixedCellSize()
